description: I am a 4'8" mother of 3 grown children. They live in other states. I don't have any friends where I live. I would love to meet interesting people who I can share my culture with. I would love to know more about someone's culture and well. I love meeting new people. I am a smoker, but not nicotine. I partake in the herb....daily. I love to laugh and just be silly. I like playing Tekken on PlayStation. I love to learn new dances. Love,love, ❤ food. I'm worth getting to know.
